subject: Black Friday Sale. Last chance to upgrade! Wp
preview: Hi Wp, TL;DR: save upto 50% on Rank Math and receive $4,000+ in bonuses designed to ensure your next SEO effort is a massive success - available only until some more time. >> Check out the promotion b

full_threads.body:
Hi Wp,

TL;DR: save upto 50% on Rank Math and receive $4,000+ in bonuses designed to ensure your next SEO effort is a massive success - available only until some more time.

>> Check out the promotion by clicking here.

As always, a few people have asked questions about Rank Math's special promotion that ends soon.

I decided that it would be faster and easier to compile everyone's questions in one place than answer individual emails.

So here we go!

Q. What happens next year on my renewal date if I purchase today? Will my annual subscription rate climb to the rate that's current at that time?

Good news - your renewal fee is grandfathered in. You'll pay the exact same this time next year for your Rank Math's annual subscription. Unless you cancel, of course :)

Q. Am I locked into a long-term contract

Absolutely not. Cancel at any time.

Q. What types of industries do Rank Math work for?

Rank Math works for nearly any industry you can imagine - from local business (including restaurants, service-based businesses, home-based business, and brick & mortar retail shops) eCommerce, podcasters, tech blogs, food, blogging, book-authors, coaches and consultants, software & apps, events, travel, and more.

Q. How long is this special offer available?

Only until tonight November 27 at 11:59 pm Pacific.

Q. On how many websites can I use Rank Math?

You can use the Rank Math PRO on unlimited personal websites, and you can use the business plan on 200 client & personal websites. Personal websites are the ones you own 100% and not a client website or a partnership with someone. A personal website can be a business, earn you money and you can even sell it to anyone but it needs to belong to you.

Q. Does Rank Math work in multiple languages?

It's a big world out there, and Rank Math supports ALL languages. Conquer your local search market, or go after new profitable markets located anywhere in the world.

Q. Will Rank Math import the data from Yoast plugin?

Yes! Rank Math has a 1-click importer for your older SEO plugins like Yoast, AIO SEO, SEOPress, and can easily import all the data in a few minutes.

Q. What if I don't like the PRO version of the plugin?

No worries at all. We have an extended 30 days, no questions asked money-back guarantee. Just shoot an email and you'll be refunded immediately. Though, I bet you won't ask for that!

Q. Do you offer support to help me get started with Rank Math PRO?

You'll not only find a series of QuickStart guides and videos to walk you through every aspect of setting up your SEO plugin, but you'll also have access to a world-class support team to answer all your questions!

Phew, that's a lot of questions and answers!

(You have less than 24 hours left to get in on this outstanding deal, and I want to make sure that I answer as many as I can.)

Ready to claim your 50% discount and special bonus package?

Then simply click here to get in on this outstanding deal!

Feel free to reply to this email in case you have any further questions. I'm here to help.

To your success,
Bhanu Ahluwalia

Don't want to receive these emails or any future plugin updates? Unsubscribe here
Rank Math Ventures LLP, EC-320, G-8, Area Rajouri Garden, Maya Enclave, Hari Nagar, New Delhi, IN - 110064
